p: The next coronavirus outbreak occurred in 2012 beginning in Saudi Arabia in a patient diagnosed with acute pneumonia, the cause of which was identified as Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) [ 5]. 2500 cases of MERS-CoV infection were diagnosed in 24 countries of which 800 died before it's resolution in 2014 [ 6]. Thereafter another outbreak in humans occurred in 2015 in South Korea resulting in 186 cases and 36 deaths.
